description: ArtLunch Food is a pioneering catering initiative founded in 2002 in Armenia. Starting with a $100 investment from selling a wedding ring, they grew to become the largest canteen chain in Armenia, expanding internationally, with over 70 branches and expansions into Russia, the USA, and Kazakhstan. Key milestones included securing government grants and winning tenders with major companies. The initiative emphasizes fresh, diverse menus and has adapted to market demands, including a focus on healthy eating and eco-friendly practices.
name: ArtLunch Food
